mapper.select: SELECT FILE_ID, SEQ, NAME, TYPE, SAVE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, UPLOADED_PATH, THUMB_PATH FROM A_FILE WHERE FILE_ID = #{fileId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO A_FILE ( FILE_ID, SEQ, NAME, TYPE, SAVE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, UPLOADED_PATH, THUMB_PATH ) SELECT #{fileId} AS FILE_ID, (SELECT (IFNULL(MAX(SEQ), 0) + 1) FROM A_FILE WHERE FILE_ID = #{fileId}) AS SEQ, #{name} AS NAME, #{type} AS TYPE, #{saveName} AS SAVE_NAME, #{fileSize} AS FILE_SIZE, #{uploadedPath} AS UPLOADED_PATH, #{thumbPath} AS THUMB_PATH
